Разработчики давным давно положили хуй на всё комюнити этой игры. Фиксить баги с перепрыгиванием окон и палеток? Похуй! Пофиксить неиграбельные карты? Похуй! Балансить перки и аддоны? Похуй! Выкинуть посреди игры из-за того, что игра сама изменяет файлы твоей игры? Вот это мы можем. Добавить хуеву тучу длс и скинов, чтобы собирать деньги с хомячков? Да, отличная идея! Ранковая система - НЕ РАБОЧАЯ ПОЕБОТА. Тебя с фулл стаком 1-4 ранковыми сурвами может спокойно закинуть к 20 ману, причем если его выйграть, то могут вообще не дать каплю. Приходиться поддаваться, ловить хиты и специально давай повесить себя на крюк. Им похуй абсолютно на всё и всех: баги, баланс, игроки, читеры, багоюзеры ВСЕ ИДУТ НАХУЙ!!!!!!!11!!!11!1 Никому не рекомендую, никогда не покупайте.

有一说一，杀机还是很好玩的，推荐新手入坑，但还带一些血腥暴力的元素啦，如有不适者请谨慎选择，但玩久了也就习惯了，还可以把他当成搞笑游戏（狗头）最好叫上朋友们一起玩，沙雕指数五颗星（滑稽）
还有一个就是G的问题，G的话，高端局应该比较常见吧（我才人类15段遇到很少，就遇到一次天龙巴布=-=）听大佬们说国服G哥有点多（=x=）
最后，这游戏挺“上瘾”的，停不下来啊
（要是有萌新的话，加我咱一起玩哈，希望吧）

FUN TO PLAY WITH FRIENDS

The community can be pretty toxic, they break the game every three months, and it has a steep learning curve if you play killer (survivor is not as simple as it seems either).

If none of that turns you off, then I recommend you play this game. It's fun and rewarding once you get good at a role. Lots of interesting killers to play and learn, some better than others.

Игра хорошая, побегать в одиночку или с друзьями от маньяка можно. Конечно, "фичи" у игры есть, такие как хиты через препятствие и так далее, но с ними мириться можно. Самой большой проблемой игры являются так называемые "фейс кемперы" - маньяки, стоящие вплотную к висящему на крюке игроку так, что его не спасти. И это - самый большой недочет данной игры на момент написания обзора (наигранно +-60 часов).

[h1] My Steam award"Labor of Love" nomination[/h1]

Because the only way that you will keep playing this game is if you in fact, love it. Like a special needs child, you cant get angry at it, and any time it does something even remotely useful its not something even short of a miracle. 

My guys at BHVR took 5 years to fix pallets and dead hard, and as a result everyone thinks its a glitch or a bug when they work as intended. 

But for real, if you havnt heard about this game, get ready for the most MLG competitive party game there is. Im talking people abusing the most busted and unbalanced shit you have ever seen.

bom corrigiram o erro dos blood points, pelo menos o meu não tem aparecido mais esse problema, obrigado por resolverem, enfim voltarei a jogar o jogo pois como havia mencionado o jogo é excelente e resolveram isso bem rápido então deixo meus agradecimentos a equipe técnica que faz esses ajustes.
Easy to learn hard to master, hours of fun, i enjoyed myself, i like this kind of teamwork/survival, or you can just say no i don't want buddies and just play as killer :P

the devs keep changing things not a single person complained about, for example the new HUD and survivor animations, just for the game to look better (their opinion i guess, but its making the game worse), to appeal more to the mass of casual gamers and add new 10$ skins and a pass from time to time to cash out. On the other hand they dont fix bugs, change broken perks or the dumb ranking system. It gives me the imrpession that they have no idea about their own game and think that the actual criticism is just hate and nothing is actually wrong with the game.

And what is the PTB (Player Test Build) for, if they dont even care that most players complained about the changes?

I first reviewed this game back when I was fairly new to it and I decided to come back and update my review for a few reasons.
1: I nominated this game and wanted to update my review for the task :P
2: I want to talk about Survivor Balancing issues
3: I want to talk about Killer Balancing issues
4: I want to talk about flaws with the game overall

So I want to start of with saying I like this game which is why I'm giving it a positive review, there's nothing like the first few times you get an escape or your first 4K and the game can become addicting really fast but if you play enough to get to the higher ranks you learn the game has a stale meta and can get annoying and make you rage really fast. After you go against Freddy, Deathslinger, Legion, And Leatherface for the thousandth time in a row it starts to show and it does in a bad way, but I'm not saying this can't go for killer either because survivors just run the same old boring perks: Decisive strike, Iron Will, Borrowed Time, Unbreakable, Dead Hard, Sprint Burst, and Adrenaline, but if none of that bothers you the game also has it's problems for 1 thing the maps for the most part are survivor side with maps like Ormond and Azarov's resting place that are so big they can make your frames drop are so big that killers are basically done before it started, but I'm not saying that this can't go for survivors either because there are these horrid maps called indoor maps, hell you night not even like them if you're a killer but indoor maps have limited visibility, bad loops, it's hard to find gens, and they have overall just bad aesthetics. My point with this review isn't to put you off from the game, not at all, but I am just trying to address some of the issues and that can be off putting for some people. I don't want this to sound like I hate the game so I do want to put in some pros of the game: the achievements in this game are really fun to work for and feel rewarding, there is a rush of adrenaline that you get when you escape a trial, it's fun to play with your friends, the bloodweb is really intuitive and addicting, there is a lot of characters from a lot of horror films which is really good for all of you horror junkies, and it feels rewarding to do good in a game with the emblem system. In conclusion if someone asked me if they should get this game I would tell them they should but I mainly wanted to make this review to address some problems with them game that are off putting.

Game is great and defintely has a change of pace. I love all the different soundtracks to the killers approaching the survivors and balance it has when playing the game. Also big horror movie fan and if you are too, this is right up your alley. Not only playing as some of the iconic killers but the survivors too! Look forward to what new updates are to come. If I had one to choose a killer and a survivor that would be challenging for the game designers to make; I would have to say bring in a "Child's Play" chapter. And have Chucky as the killer (with other doll costumes) and have Andy as the survivor. Both characters are short but I challenge somebody on your team to try to design it! 9.2 out of 10 all day, some people do want more of story mode but I stayed entertained for hours through the night. Thanks again for all the fun
